title: Grover search planner for HEO-marked indices
statement_md: For a search space of size $N$ with $t$ marked items (solutions to $S(n)+k=m^d$ in $\{1,\dots,N\}$), choose $r \approx \left\lfloor \frac{\pi}{4\arcsin\sqrt{t/N}} - \tfrac{1}{2} \right\rfloor$ Grover iterations. Success probability is $\sin^2((2r+1)\arcsin\sqrt{t/N})$. Classical queries $\approx N/t$ vs. Grover $\approx \frac{\pi}{4}\sqrt{N/t}$.
assumptions_md: Assumes at least one marked index ($t>0$) and a standard Grover oracle consistent with the indicator $X_S$ on the chosen domain.
